#define ntr(x,it) for(auto it = (x).rbegin();it!=(x).rend();++it)
#define ufy(v) sort(all(v));(v).erase(unique(all((v))),(v).end())

#define boost ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);cout.tie(0)

inline int add(int a,int b, int m=INF){a+=b;if(a>=m)a-=m;return a;}
inline int mul(int a,int b, int m=INF){return (int)(((ll)a*(ll)b)%m);}
inline int norm(int x,int m=INF){if(x>=m)x%=m;if(x<0)x+=m;return x;}
inline int neg(int x,int m=INF){x=-x;return norm(x);}
#define mid ((L+r)>>1)
vi t,l;
vi y;
vector<pair<ii,ii> > q;
void LAZY(int no, bool leaf)
{
	t[no]+=l[no];
	if(!leaf)
	{
		l[2*no]+=l[no];
		l[2*no+1]+=l[no];
	}
	l[no]=0;
}
void upd(int no, int L, int r, int ul, int ur, int val)
{
	LAZY(no,L==r);
	if(r<ul or L>ur)return;
	if(L>=ul and r<=ur){l[no]+=val;LAZY(no,L==r);return;}
	upd(2*no,L,mid,ul,ur,val);
	upd(2*no+1,mid+1,r,ul,ur,val);
	t[no]=max(t[2*no],t[2*no+1]);
	
}
int main()
{
    boost;
    TCASE
    {
    	int n;
    	cin>>n;
    	t.clr();
    	y.clr();
    	q.clr();
    	l.clr();
    	FOR(i,0,n-1)
    	{
    		int x1,x2,y1,y2;
    		cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;
    		y.pb(y1);
    		y.pb(y2);
    		q.pb(MP(MP(x1,-1),MP(y1,y2)));
    		q.pb(MP(MP(x2,1),MP(y1,y2)));
    		//q.pb({{x2,1},{y1,y2}});
    	}
    	sort(all(q));
    	y.pb(-INF);
    	y.pb(INF);
    	ufy(y);
    	int no=y.size()-2;
    	t.rz(4*no+40);
    	l.rz(4*no+40);
    	int ans=0;
    	FOR(i,0,sz(q)-1)
    	{
    		int y1=q[i].S.F,y2=q[i].S.S;
    		int p1=lower_bound(all(y),y1)-y.begin();
    		int p2=lower_bound(all(y),y2)-y.begin();
    		upd(1,1,no,p1,p2,-(q[i].F.S));
    		
    		ans=max(ans,t[1]+l[1]);
    	}
    	cout<<ans<<"\n";
    }
	return 0;
}
